column3: but the place was packed.  I got the tonkotsu spicy (but that was seriously the same spice as the tonkotsu hot) and put in tons of garlic
column5: hehe.  I like how you can crush your own garlic!  The broth was great
column6: and the noodles were delicious.  It was overall super filling and I could not stop slurping up the bowl!
